description: Browse privately, search locally. Organize tabs, block tracking, and use Tor. WebLibre is a privacy-first browser that puts you in control. Built on Mozilla’s Gecko engine, WebLibre combines powerful privacy features with advanced tab management and a personal local search engine—so your data stays on your device, not in the cloud. - Personal Local Search Engine Instantly search across open tabs, browsing history, and your favorite web feeds—all indexed privately on your device. No third-party search engine required. - Bangs: Direct Site Search Use thousands of “bangs” to search directly on popular websites, bypassing external search engines for faster, more private results. - Tab Containers for Privacy & Organization Separate your browsing into containers for work, shopping, or personal use. Each container has its own cookies, settings, and can be locked with biometric authentication. - Integrated Tor Proxy Route selected tabs or containers through the Tor network for enhanced anonymity and to bypass censorship—without leaving your browser. - Tree View Tab Navigation Visualize and manage complex browsing sessions with hierarchical tab organization. Never lose track of your research or workflow. - No Tracking, No Cloud Storage WebLibre never tracks you. All your data—searches, history, and feeds—remains on your device for maximum privacy. Additional Highlights - Biometric Authentication: Lock sensitive tabs or containers with your fingerprint or face. - Efficient Resource Use: Lightweight tabs and persistent sessions for seamless multitasking. - Open Source Foundations: Built using trusted Mozilla components. Take back control of your browsing. Download WebLibre and experience privacy, speed, and organization—your way.
